data.title: Miss Intercontinental India 2018

data.text:
The biggest adventure you can take is live the life of your dreams! – My life is an epitome of these words by Oprah Winfrey.

Namaskar! I am Suman Chellani from the nation that exudes vibrance of rich and cultural heritage – India.

I wasn’t born with a silver spoon in my mouth. I had no godfathers or fairy godmothers to prop my into the big league. Yet today, I stand tall on a platform built by my sweat, toil and tears.

I have been the face of several brands. I Realized Pleasing looks and professional poise have sold fashion products, jewellery and high-end luggage alike. In addition to ad campaigns, photo shoots, video shoots and fashion shows has been my Red Carpet Journey to walk on.

I was Honoured to be crowned as Miss Gujarat in 2011! Believing in versatility has taken me to beyond the scope of the camera and into video and game jockeying, as a speaker and my biggest forte – a master of ceremonies.

As a Professional Anchor, It has Enriched my Life by Hosting an events for the entire spectrum of industries. From corporate, entertainment and awards nights to brand launches, seminars and inaugurations; from Government mega-events and movie promotions to weddings and anniversaries.

I have been Honoured to Host events with the biggest names in attendance – Hon. Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Former Gujarat Chief Minister Anandiben Patel, OP Kohli, etc. She’s shared the dais with living legends of entertainment – Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Govinda and Juhi Chawla, to name a few.

I also Believe in to be a personality that adds an extra dimension to event nights. And I made cameo appearances in to films, alongside big names such as Arjun Kapoor, Alia Bhatt and Amrita Singh. And Recently Released her 2 albums Titled as – “Hindustan” and “Tere aane se”.

Professionally well qualified, I have earned a Masters in Business Administration (Human Resources), Diploma in French and a Diploma in Aviation, Hospitality and Travel Management.

During the initial career years in aviation – on the ground, and in the air… first with Go Airways and then with Emirates Airlines as CABIN CREW. I was based in Dubai – From where I travelled to 40 countries. My journey with Emirates helped me absorb myriad cultures of the world, making me more accommodative of people with different backdrops and ethnicities. And Where I admire to learn new Languages and Now I can speak 4 fluent languages and can greet in more than 18 languages.

Very Excited to meet Stunning Fellow Contestants. Dhanyawad.

Thank You

Suman Chellani
